segments.text: I want to take a look at that home with the Open House flags out front .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a wonderful neighborhood ! Can you find that house on our Open House list ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that is one of the houses that we have on our list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They always make the front yards look so great for Open Houses . Let â€™ s see what the inside looks like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to go sign my name in the registry to let the listing agent know that we were here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Signing the registry is a good idea . I think I want to see the kitchen next .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really appreciate that the listing agent provided water on such a hot day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to pick up a flyer with the information about the house on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the current asking price listed on the flyer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The asking price has recently gone down to two hundred and twenty-five thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
